artist: Engraver: Michel Lasne; Publisher: Israel Henriet
description: portrait of Jacques Callot, bust length turned left; in an oval cartouche forming a creature's head in upper part; coat of arms with 5 stars in lower part
inscription:
Signature, Title,Date, and Inscription

In plate in black: [Jacobus Calottus Nobilis An.Æt. Suae 36  1629 LOTHARINGUS CALCOGRAPHUS/ En Miraculum Artis, et Nature; Hic delineat et incidit/ in are paruo guidguid magnificum Natura fecit; imo/ perficit illa omni opus tiam cum dextera tanti viri;/ vndè merito creditur calestium Idearum vinicus havres/ Israel amicus optnust excudit/ M Lasne delineauit et fecit]; in pencil on sheet: [1-209]; on verso in pencil: [1/f]
title: Portrait of Jacobus Calottus Nobilis
